nodes.text: During the Cold War between the Galactic Republic and the reconstituted Sith Empire, the genius scientist Doctor Nasan Godera maintained several laboratories on the ruined world of Taris. Constructed by his droid assistants, one of the facilities was attacked by Imperial forces under the command of Watcher One of Imperial Intelligence in an attempt to locate the doctor. After Godera's departure from Taris, the laboratory became the base of operations for Doctor Eckard Lokin.
